We've been refactoring the project and Claude Desktop has been erasing responses.

I tried using some other tools like Windsurfer, which I allowed to make updates, but that ended up being unusable.

So now let's review the code as it is and see if its even in a usable state or if we have to rollback all of the changes and restart the refactoring.

Since there is a bug in Claude Desktop, we need to go in small increments.

Let's only look at packages/core first.
